acme.exams.model

Interface IExam

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Exam

    public interface IExam
    Defines an exam

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FAILED_EXAM_MARK
      Constant indicating the mark for a studet which has not passed the exam
      static int MIN_MARK
      The sufficient mark for the exam
      static int NO_MARK
      Constant indicating no mark for a student for this exam

        De-register a student from the exam
        Parameters:
        enrollmentId - The student's id
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the removal was successfull or not
        Throws:
